title: This is Tokyo
brief_description: A survey of Tokyo showing the business and industrial centres, historic buildings like the Imperial Palace and Buddhist temples, the landscape gardens and the people who live and work in this huge city.
description: A survey of Tokyo showing the business and industrial centres, historic buildings like the Imperial Palace and Buddhist temples, the landscape gardens and the people who live and work in this huge city.
